hero.title: Welcome to
hero.description: Your web application for managing of your school's library.
hero.manage_documents: From this platform, you, dear members of the documentation unit, have the ability to manage documents and reservations automatically, with ease and peace of mind.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: We offer a range of services to enhance your library management experience.

service1.title: Book Management
service1.description: Efficiently organize books, track borrow and return statuses, and classify them by genre and section.

service2.title: Thesis Management
service2.description: Centralize academic theses, dissertations, and research documents with detailed metadata.

service3.title: User Profile Management
service3.description: Allow users to manage their information and  view history.

service4.title: Administrative Management
service4.description: Access administrative tools, configure system settings, and give dedicated support.
